text: Raymond Bellot (9 June 1929 – 24 February 2019) was a French footballer. He was part of the French squad which finished third at the 1958 FIFA World Cup,https://www.fifa.com/worldcup/archive/edition=15/teams/team=43946.html but he never won a cap for the France national football team.https://www.lesviolets.com/actu/raymond-bellot-ancien-joueur-du-toulouse- fc-est-decede,48575.html ==Club career== * 1955–1958: AS Monaco FC ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2019 deaths Category:French footballers Category:1958 FIFA World Cup players Category:Racing Club de France Football players Category:AS Monaco FC players Category:Stade Français (association football) players Category:Ligue 1 players Category:Association football forwards
title: Raymond Bellot
